ADS.Text1: Despite you having only a couple of weapons at the beginning of the game, it will soon present you with a huge arsenal of items and an upgrading system.
ADS.Text2: The main hero in teardown has a strange set of items. You are able to find weapons, like a massive shotgun or a compact gun.
ADS.Text3: They are a perfect option when you need to inflict clear point damage, like cut the ropes or make a small hole.
ADS.Text4: Different bombs and dynamite allow you to make huge holes and destroy whole buildings or walls.
ADS.Text5: But remember to hide to avoid damage from the explosion. Of course, the most primitive tool – a huge sledgehammer is also here.
ADS.Text6: It completely destroys walls and other objects, but isn’t the option to crush metal. Here the metal cutter will help you.
ADS.Text7: It perfectly cuts any metal, but burns everything around. But you can quickly eliminate the consequences of its use with the fire extinguisher.
ADS.Text8: Rate Us 5 Stars And Download and play teardown app and Let's start your endless journey!
